insight: **Network Quality Churn Insight:** This high-value customer ($9055 CLTV) churned despite subscribing to Operator B (Champion)'s premium "Infinite Plus" plan due to network issues in Rural California. Their extremely high data usage (109.07GB download) and significant OTT consumption (17.20GB) suggests streaming and connectivity problems in their area. They likely switched to Operator T's "Go5G Next" which offers better network coverage in rural areas.
